koohiiStory2: IÂ´ll confuse this with use (#990), so build a distinction right from the start. For me, "utilize" has an artificial, business-speak connotation; you only utilize "utilize" when youÂ´re trying to puff up what youÂ´re saying and sound important. So: "BioTools Inc introduces the FG2000 screwdriver, utilizing the our latest FleshGrip(tm) technology!" IÂ´m seeing this as a picture of a stubby screwdriver with a handle made of flesh, a short shaft, and prongs to hold a screw in place until you drive it.

humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle is like a barrel, with a barrel on the left and a handle on the right. (See "Collection" 19762, 21405 for the font. The original meaning is a barrel, and the latter is used as a phony to indicate implementation and use. (Yu Xingwu, Yang Shuda, Qiu Xigui) "Shuowen": "You can use it, you can do it." " Yong " and " tong " are separate words, see " tong ".

Oracle said implementation. For example, "Collection" 1616: "Yizi (å·³) Bu: å€ (æƒ ) Erniu and (ancestor) Yi. Use." "Huadong" 459: "Guichou Bu: å€ (æƒ ) Er Lao Yuqi (ancestor) A. No." " Use " and "Don't" appear after the proverb, indicating whether the content of the proverb is implemented.

Bronze is used as a verb to indicate use. Such as Zhao Zhongli: "It is used by his descendants and grandchildren Sun Yongbao." It is also used as a preposition, equivalent to " to ". For example, the white plate of Guo Jizi: "Wang Wei (gives) rides on horses is the left (zuo) king." It is also used as a conjunction, which can express the relationship of inheritance. ï¼ŒUse Zha (as) and (ancestor) B [â»– Zun] (Zun).â€ It also means causality, which is equivalent to because, like Yu Ding: Fang leads the Nanhuai corpse (barbarian), the eastern corpse (barbarian), and the vast expedition to the south or (country), the east or (country), as far as the calendar is concerned." And Dongguo, as for the calendar.

The Jinwen also has the term "useful", which means performing duties. Such as Shanding: "Yi (given) female (ru) is the (ancestor) flag, use things." It means that the flag that rewards your ancestors is given to you to perform duties.

The Qin Bamboo Slips of the Warring States Period " use " is an example of the original meaning. "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jian 100: "Counties and workshops listen to officials as Zhengheng Shi wins (tired), fights with (bucket) rises, and does not celebrate the new year." " Use " is pronounced " bucket ", Organizer's note: "Bucket bucket, see "LÃ¼ Shichunqiu. Zhongchunji" and "Historical Records. The Biography of Shang Monarch". In the Qin and Han Dynasties, ten buckets were used as buckets, and six buckets were used as buckets." The whole sentence means county and workshop. The authority, bucket and liter of weighing instruments should be calibrated at least once a year.

" Use " also means use, such as "The Analects. "Xue Er": "The use of ritual, harmony is the most precious." It also expressed adoption, such as "Historical Records. "The Book of the First Emperor of Qin": "Han Fei made Qin, and Qin used Li Si to leave the issue, not to die Yunyang." It also specifically refers to eating and drinking, such as "Han Feizi. " Use " means financial use and expense. Such as "The Analects. "Yan Yuan": "Years of hunger, insufficient consumption, how is it?" "Mo Zi. "Ciguo": "The inheritance is in the body and the people are taught. It is governed by the people of the world, and the money is enough."
